settings.title: Introducing Fièra <br class="forMob">Luxury Concealer
settings.sub_title: The only mature skin concealer of its kind. Offering gorgeous, complete coverage that lasts, never cakes, and stays out of those fine lines.
settings.content: Women search for years looking for the right concealer, only to find that there are none. Why? Because most concealers are a one-age-fits-all. So we took it upon ourselves to create the last concealer women with mature skin will ever need.

settings.title: How Fièra Luxury <br class="forMob">Concealer Works
settings.sub_title: NEVER settles into those fine lines, and achieves younger, firmer and brighter looking skin in the long-term.
settings.content_1: Offers gorgeously full coverage, making wrinkles, fine lines, and other skin impurities disappear in a near-instant.
settings.content_2: Contains powerful antioxidant activity, keeping your skin safe from free radicals, sun damage, and even improving the signs of oxidative damage over time.
settings.title_3: Never Settles Into Fine Lines And Wrinkles
settings.content_3: While most concealers tend to settle into fine lines, making them look even more pronounced, Fièra Concealer does not -- ensuring a beautiful, even, and smooth looking face.
settings.content_4: This puts Fièra Concealer above all others. Not only do you get near-perfect coverage within seconds, but you also get smoother, brighter and younger-looking skin with prolonged use.

settings.title: Sodium Hyaluronate
settings.content: The sodium salt of hyaluronic acid, able to hold more water than any other natural substance—up to 1000 times its weight in water for maximum skin hydration that tightens and improves the skin’s overall appearance.

settings.title: Vitamin C
settings.content: The skin tissues LOVE Vitamin C due to its powerful antioxidant properties, helping to protect against free radicals and improves the skin’s overall appearance with consistent use.

settings.title: Hydrolyzed Collagen
settings.content: Collagen makes up 75% of your skin, making this high-quality version a no-brainer to enhance the appearance of dry and damaged skin and achieve a dewy, fresh and younger-looking skin.

settings.title: Lecithin
settings.content: An amazing hydrating ingredient that restores skin to its smooth and comfortable texture.

settings.title: Vitamin E
settings.content: Another potent antioxidant, among the best for protecting against free radicals and sun damage.

settings.title: Haloxyl
settings.content: The "dark under-eye circle" remover. If you’ve ever fallen victim to the dreaded dark circles and bags, this ingredient will be your angelic savior.

settings.title: Active Ingredients
settings.sub_title: 7 scientifically proven ingredients for firmer, brighter, and younger-looking skin…
settings.popup_content: Water (Aqua), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Cetyl Alcohol, Ozokerite, Phytosteryl Macadamiate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Retinyl Palmitate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Sodium Hyaluronate, Lecithin, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Tocopherol, Glycerin, Steareth-20, Chrysin, N-Hydroxysuccinimide, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, [+/- (May Contain): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Ultramarines (CI 77007)].

settings.content: Squeeze onto your fingers and gently tap over problem areas or imperfections, then blend into the skin.
For full-face long lasting coverage, apply more Fièra concealer to the face and blend over the entire area as a foundation.
Always apply to washed and cleansed skin for best results and moisture retention.
Sit back, relax, and let it work its magic. Repeat.

settings.title: 30 Day Money Back Guarantee
settings.content: We’re so confident you'll love our Fièra products we offer a Hassle-free 30 day Money Back Guarantee. If you're not satisfied with your purchase simply return the items back to us for a full refund.
